name: Roger
description: Roger is an AI-powered tool designed to enhance aviation empowering pilots. Initially targeting the General Aviation sector with plans to expand to airlines. Roger leverages advanced AI to assist pilots, ensuring better decision-making and operational management. The tool is backed by extensive research and has been tailored through alpha and beta testing phases, with a 'try it yourself' approach to demonstrate its unique capabilities and benefits to pilots worldwide
